item.title: By: wangamachang
item.dc:creator: wangamachang
item.description: this bike could be so much cheaper if they dropped the hydraulic shifting on it (even though it'd be less cooler), but i'm guessing they could drop about 2Gs... in addition, need to get rid of those avid brakes and put on some shimanos!
item.content:encoded: this bike could be so much cheaper if they dropped the hydraulic shifting on it (even though it’d be less cooler), but i’m guessing they could drop about 2Gs… in addition, need to get rid of those avid brakes and put on some shimanos!

item.title: By: Kent
item.dc:creator: Kent
item.description: wow, my mind has been blown by this video. and all the settings it has is pretty crazy. imagine if dealers include these with a purchase of one of their cars? this thing looks so fun to ride.
item.content:encoded: wow, my mind has been blown by this video. and all the settings it has is pretty crazy. imagine if dealers include these with a purchase of one of their cars? this thing looks so fun to ride.
